short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your learning experience on Canvas LMS with AI-integration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Canvas-Wise is a browser extension that helps you complete your assignments faster by providing AI-generated answers to your questions.

It integrates seamlessly with your Canvas LMS and works on all your courses. On any quiz, test, or exam, Canvas-Wise acts as an autonomous assistant, providing you with the answers you need to succeed automatically.

💻 Feature Highlights:
⚡ Quick Validation: Enhance your understanding of complex topics with AI-driven question-answering capabilities, providing clear and concise explanations.
📝 Comprehensive Coverage: Canvas-Wise supports all question types offered by the Canvas LMS, ensuring no question is left unanswered.
🔗 Seamless Integration: Designed for user convenience, Canvas-Wise automatically detects problems, and auto-completes them to save you time and research.
👆 Simple Button Click: With a user-friendly interface, accessing AI assistance is as simple as clicking a button, ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted academic experience.
